author: Roisin O'Connor, Roisin O'Connor
title: Coronavirus: Tom Hanks sends update to fans after arriving home in LA with Rita Wilson
description: Actors have recovered from the virus after testing positive while Hanks was shooting a film in Australia
content:
Tom Hanks has shared his first update after arriving home with wife Rita Wilson from their coronavirus ordeal.
The Hollywood couple tested positive for Covid-19 while Hanks was shooting a new Elvis Presley biopic in Australia. 
After two weeks in quarantine… [+1204 chars]
